Language.name: cs
Language.Text:
Tak takhle vypadali Proteané?
Nádherné, že? Ta plastika je skvìle zachovaná.
Kartáèek?
Hele tady, to vypadá jako nìjaké puzzle, trošku to srovnám ...
"Prosíme pomozte nám!"

Language.name: en
Language.Text:
So this is what Proteans looked like?
Gorgeous, right? The statue is in excellent shape.
Brush?
Look here, this looks like some kind of puzzle, I'll straighten it a bit ...
"Please help us!"
